LanguageData.VV_Gizmo_ViviEggProgressTooltip: Shows how much time is left until the next egg is laid.\n\nWhen progress reaches 100% and a suitable Vivi incubator is available, Vivi will go there to lay the egg.
LanguageData.VV_Gizmo_ManaStorageTooltip: Amount of mana currently held by {THING}. \nAbsorbs environment mana released by arcane plants, and when situated in an area containing environment mana it gradually recharges. \nAt its current location, it is absorbing {DAILYMANA} environment mana per day.
